member.name: T:UMapx.Video.RealSense.IVideoDepthSource
member.summary: Extension interface for handling Intel RealSense depth events.

member.name: T:UMapx.Video.RealSense.NewDepthEventArgs
member.summary: Arguments for new depth event from video source.

member.name: M:UMapx.Video.RealSense.NewDepthEventArgs.#ctor(System.UInt16[0:,0:])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:UMapx.Video.RealSense.RealSenseConverter
member.summary: Internal class to convert RealSense frames into bitmaps.

member.name: T:UMapx.Video.RealSense.RealSenseVideoSource
member.summary:
Video source for Intel RealSense Depth camera.
This video source class captures video data from Intel RealSense Depth camera. More information can be found on the website: https://www.intelrealsense.com/stereo-depth/

member.name: M:UMapx.Video.RealSense.RealSenseVideoSource.#ctor
member.summary: Creates video source for Intel RealSense Depth camera.

remarks.para: The property allows to set one of the video resolutions supported by the camera. Use property to get the list of supported video resolutions.

para.note: The property must be set before camera is started to make any effect.

remarks.para: Default value of the property is set to , which means default video resolution is used.
The property allows to set one of the depth resolutions supported by the camera. Use property to get the list of supported depth resolutions.

para.note: The property must be set before camera is started to make any effect.

remarks.para: Default value of the property is set to , which means default depth resolution is used.

member.name: P:UMapx.Video.RealSense.RealSenseVideoSource.SerialNumber
member.summary: Serial number of Intel RealSense Depth camera.

member.name: P:UMapx.Video.RealSense.RealSenseVideoSource.FirmwareVersion
member.summary: Firmware version of Intel RealSense Depth camera.

member.name: P:UMapx.Video.RealSense.RealSenseVideoSource.FramesReceived
member.remarks: Number of frames the video source provided from the moment of the last access to the property.

member.name: P:UMapx.Video.RealSense.RealSenseVideoSource.BytesReceived
member.remarks: Number of bytes the video source provided from the moment of the last access to the property.

member.name: P:UMapx.Video.RealSense.RealSenseVideoSource.IsRunning
member.remarks: Current state of video source object - running or not.

member.name: E:UMapx.Video.RealSense.RealSenseVideoSource.NewDepth
member.summary: Intel RealSense depth action event handler.

member.name: E:UMapx.Video.RealSense.RealSenseVideoSource.NewFrame
member.summary: Intel RealSense frame action event handler.

member.name: E:UMapx.Video.RealSense.RealSenseVideoSource.VideoSourceError
member.remarks: This event is used to notify clients about any type of errors occurred in video source object, for example internal exceptions.

remarks.para: This event is used to notify clients that the video playing has finished.

member.name: M:UMapx.Video.RealSense.RealSenseVideoSource.Start
member.remarks: Starts video source and return execution to caller. Video source object creates background thread and notifies about new frames with the help of event.

member.name: M:UMapx.Video.RealSense.RealSenseVideoSource.SignalToStop
member.summary: Signal video source to stop its work.
member.remarks: Signals video source to stop its background thread, stop to provide new frames and free resources.

member.name: M:UMapx.Video.RealSense.RealSenseVideoSource.WaitForStop
member.summary: Wait for video source has stopped.

member.name: M:UMapx.Video.RealSense.RealSenseVideoSource.OnNewFrame(System.Drawing.Bitmap)
member.summary: Called when video source gets new frame.

member.name: M:UMapx.Video.RealSense.RealSenseVideoSource.OnNewDepth(System.UInt16[0:,0:])
member.summary: Called when video source gets new depth.

member.name: M:UMapx.Video.RealSense.RealSenseVideoSource.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes Intel RealSense Depth camera source.
